How It Works

Recommend Justia Marketing Solutions to other lawyers and law firms in your network.

Give your unique referral code to interested lawyers and law firms.

You receive a $100 Justia Credit applicable to your own marketing solutions after an eligible lawyer you refer completes the sign-up process for qualified Justia Marketing Solutions.

Eligible referred lawyers also receive $50 in Justia Credit applicable to Justia Premium Placements in the Justia Lawyer Directory, Justia Amplify PPC management services, or a Justia Elevate website.
